answers.answer: My baby was born at 1.88kg. I had gestational diabetes so they kept him for a few days to monitor him. Otherwise he was healthy and is gaining weight. He is 4months old now and weight 5.2kg.

Hey hun, my daughter was born at 27+6 and she was breathing all on her own (no intubation) she was born weighing 2 lbs 2 Oz. She was on and off cpap for a while. But she is now a very healthy nearly 2 year old. Try not to stress yourself. Im sure all will be okay:) best of luck babe.x

question: Im getting induced 3weeks early as my little girl has not put on any weight for two scans, also my placenta is working over time and not giving her enough nutrients that she needs. They have re assured that she wil be ok and breathing on her own but Im still very worried that she's gonna have complications. Anyone els experienced anything similar?
title: Baby weighing under 5lbs!
